## Set up 

Declare file paths. 

```{r}
input_dir <- "data"
output_dir <- "results"
plots_dir <- file.path(output_dir, "plots")
```


```{r}
if (!dir.exists(output_dir)) {
  dir.create(output_dir)
}
if (!dir.exists(plots_dir)) {
  dir.create(plots_dir)
}

`%>%` <- dplyr::`%>%`
```

Read in the results table we've pre-prepared. 

```{r}
gene_stats_df <- readr::read_tsv(file.path(input_dir,
                                           "gene_results_GSE44971.tsv"))
```

Print this out to see what it looks like. 

```{r}
gene_stats_df
```
